full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal for Food Services

## Background
Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for food services to support two government facilities in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.

## Request Details
- **Tender Reference Number**: SRV-84002929
- **Publication Date**: October 16, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2023, at 15:00 Eastern Standard Time

## Services Required
The successful bidder will provide food services for:

* Government of Canada Building (GOCB) at 100 East White Hills Road, St. John’s, NL
* Data Taxation Centre (DTC) at 290 Empire Avenue, St. John’s, NL

## Contract Details
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2029
- **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada, 161 St. Peters Road, 2nd Floor, Suite 204, Charlottetown, PE, C1A 5P7

## Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
Please refer to the complete RFP document available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22092/rfp-84002929---canada-buys---schedule-e---en.pdf

## Contact Information
For further information or clarification, please contact:
Cynthia Livingston
Tel: (782) 377-1187
Email: Cynthia.Livingston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
